name: Slowking
author: Sumiyoshi Kizuki
flavor_text: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

poke_power.name: Second Sight
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of that player’s deck and put them back on top of that player’s deck in any order. This power can’t be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
